See why our TV Essentials Plus Bundle is so popular

TV Flexibility & Control

Get lots of awesome TV features you’ve never seen before. TV Channel Exchange lets your choose the channels you really what and the Eastlink Stream app lets you watch on screens big and small.

Internet

Our Internet is superfast and our Unlimited data plan means you never have to worry about dreaded overage charges. Not to mention, it’s been ranked #1 for streaming by Netflix*.

Home Phone

The telephone connects your home to the rest of the world. When you add it to your bundle, you automatically get 13 calling features like Voicemail, Call Display, Call Waiting and more.
